item.title: It turns out that Sarah Palin is a pig
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: Her latest speech addition: bq. "Just make sure people understand that we know what Joe the Plumber was talking about when he was confronting Barack Obama and saying, 'Wait a minute, aren't you going to take my money, take my earnings and give it to somebody else who maybe hadn't worked as hard as I have worked?'" So people who make less money than me don't work as hard as me. Got it. Now I can tell the Republicans I know who make less money than me that they don't work as hard as me. Slackers. And she has taken to labeling some people "Pro-America" and "Anti-America": bq. Palin also made a point of mentioning that she loved to visit the "pro-America" areas of the country, of which North Carolina is one. No word on which states she views as unpatriotic. Since she's never spoken in Seattle, I can proudly say that I don't live in Palin's version of "America". One of my favorite political signs I've seen lately: "Hey Sarah, I can see the end of your career from my house!"

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Troy, I love your political blogging. I've been needing a good laugh about these monkeys for a while. I've spent more time fist shaking and yelling at the debates than outright laughing.
Also, like you need yet another person to tell you, your kids are absolutely gorgeous.
